definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: sg. agreeing with noun Nu 12:1, Nu 12:1 (E; only here fem.).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: id. c. art., the Cushite, of Joab's adjutant 2Sa 18:21, 2Sa 18:21 (where rd. ´[[חַכּ]], for MT ´[[כ]], We Dr Kit Bu), v:2Sa 18:22, v:2Sa 18:23, v:2Sa 18:31, v:2Sa 18:31, v:2Sa 18:32, v:2Sa 18:32; in appos. with n.pr. Je 38:7, Je 38:10, Je 38:12, Je 39:16, 2Ch 14:8.
